RPCSETTINGS: array of dicts for each RPC with individual settings

RPCSETTINGS.TIMEOUT: timeout for a request (currnetly not working)
RPCSETTINGS.MAXCHUNKSIZE: maximum block range per event poll
RPCSETTINGS.THROTTLEAMOUNT: fixed block range to reduce on failures
RPCSETTINGS.THROTTLEFACTOR: dividing factor to reduce block range on failures
RPCSETTINGS.EVENTSTARGET: number of events per poll to target, block range tries to throttle to this value
RPCSETTINGS.DEBUG: whether to add debug info to app.log for this rpc

FILESETTINGS.SAVEINTERVAL: how often to svae the current data
FILESETTINGS.FILENAME: folder name of where to store the data under settings
FILESETTINGS.MAXENTRIES: maximum number of entries to store per file

SCANSETTINGS.FORCENEW: whether to force new scan, ignoring previously saved data
SCANSETTINGS.DEBUG: whether to add debug info to app.log for the event scanner

CONTRACTS.contract addresses to scan: name of contract abi in abi folder

SCANSETTINGS.MODE: ANYEVENT: all events from the contract addresses, ANYCONTRACT: events matching signiature from any contract
EVENTS: name of events per abis to scan for if using ANYCONTRACT
